member.name: T:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.DatabaseExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the Entity Framework Database class.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.DatabaseExtensions.ExecuteStoredProcedure(System.Data.Entity.Database,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified stored procedure against a database.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.DatabaseExtensions.ExecuteStoredProcedure``1(System.Data.Entity.Database,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified stored procedure against a database.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.DatabaseExtensions.ExecuteStoredProcedureFirstOrDefault``1(System.Data.Entity.Database,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified stored procedure against a database and returns the first or default value
member.typeparam: Type of the data returned from the stored procedure.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.ObjectContextExtentions.ExecuteStoredProcedure(System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified stored procedure against a database.

member.name: M:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.ObjectContextExtentions.ExecuteStoredProcedure``1(System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the specified stored procedure against a database and returns an enumerable of T representing the data returned.
member.typeparam: Type of the data returned from the stored procedure.

member.name: P:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.StoredProcedureParameterAttribute.Size
member.summary: Size of the parameter, typically used for output parameters. If an output parameter has a size of 0 then its default to -1 (equivalent to MAX)

member.name: P:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.StoredProcedureParameterAttribute.ParameterName
member.summary: Specifies the name of the Procedure parameter, if different than the property name.

member.name: P:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.StoredProcedureParameterAttribute.Precision
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter precision.

member.name: P:EntityFrameworkExtras.EF5.StoredProcedureParameterAttribute.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter scale.
